content.text: Mr. Teru is a carpenter who lives in Cocoyasi Village.
Having built the bar in the women's quarters of the Going Merry, Teru is a skilled carpenter.
After the Straw Hat Pirates defeated the Arlong Pirates, Teru remodeled the women's quarters of the Going Merry to build a bar.
He was mentioned once, in Volume 11, when Oda was describing the fundamentals of the Going Merry.

elements.text: ↑  SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 11 (p. 104), Oda mentions Teru's contribution to the Going Merry.
